toggleMode: Toggle between light and dark display mode
languageSettings: Set system display language and AI prompt language
systemLanguageDesc: Set the language for the interface
aiPromptLanguageDesc: Set the language for AI responses
proxySettings: Configure proxy settings for accessing external services
enableProxyDesc: Access external network services through proxy
repositoryStorageDesc: Configure the storage location for repository files
docsRootDesc: All repositorys will be stored in this directory
cloudStorageDesc: Configure cloud object storage service for storing images, documents and other resources
enableCloudStorageDesc: Resources will be uploaded to cloud storage when enabled
customDomainDesc: Resource URLs will use this domain when configured
apiProviderDesc: Manage API providers, can fetch model list from Provider
noProviders: No Provider configured yet, click "Add Provider" to get started
providerInfo: Please fill in complete Provider information
deleteProvider: Are you sure you want to delete Provider "{{name}}"?
modelManagementDesc: Manage model basic information and capability tags
noModels: No models configured yet, click "Add Model" to get started
modelInfo: Please fill in complete model information
deleteModel: Are you sure you want to delete model "{{name}}"?
defaultModelConfigDesc: Specify default models for different feature categories
name: Name
modelSettingsDesc: Fill in model basic information and configuration
modelsPathDesc: API path to fetch models, default /models
creator: Creator
importFromDocsDesc: Import all MDX files from docs directory to database.
importWarning: Note: This will overwrite existing documents in the database.
exportToDocsDesc: Export documents from database to docs directory.
exportWarning: Note: This will overwrite existing files in the docs directory.
deleteDocConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete {{title}}?
deleteDocChildrenWarning: All child documents will also be deleted.
mcpConfigDesc: Configure Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers to extend AI capabilities
enableMCPDesc: Connect to MCP servers for additional tools and resources
mcpNoServers: No MCP servers configured yet, click "Add Server" to get started
mcpPasteJsonDesc: Paste MCP configuration JSON, supports full format or single server config
mcpInvalidJson: Invalid JSON format or no valid MCP server configuration found
mcpToolsDesc: Tools provided by connected MCP servers
aiFeaturesDesc: AI-powered editing features available in the editor
aiToolsDesc: Document editing tools available for AI Agents

ai.inlineEditDesc: Press Cmd+K after selecting text to trigger AI editing, streaming replacement of selected content
ai.chatRefDesc: Press Cmd+L after selecting text to reference in Chat, AI modifies document directly via tools
ai.searchReplaceDesc: AI can search and replace text via searchAndReplaceInDoc tool
ai.appendContentDesc: AI can append new paragraphs at the end of document, suitable for continuation scenarios
ai.fullRewriteDesc: AI can replace entire document content via setDocumentContent
